resources.string: Invalid input, please fill in all fields.

This App Is Used For measurement of your Laundry For Price And Weight Of It, Also For your type of Laundry

Premium Laundry = Laundry that Doesn't Need Long Time to finish only in 6–8 Hour Or A Day only
Normal Laundry = Is Your Typical Laundry 24Hour++ Or A 2 Day

Copyright © 2024 Reiko Alaudin Rasyid

All rights reserved.

Welcome to the Laundry Yuk, an Application that can help you calculate the weight, price and type of your Laundry. Currently this application can only calculate the weight, price and type. But maybe in the future you will also be able to order Laundry Services from Here, Come on Lets Try It!!
